title: need to find this old extended sans serif
content:
can anyone help me identify this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104061142im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ansichtkaartboekje-klein_4426.jpg)
author: Omniafausta

comments.content: Reminds me of Adonis (Extended), a metal typeface by Stephenson Blake (if my memory serves right)
there seem to be be quite a few fonts called Adonis, but I cannot find the one you are referring to..
I don't know if it has been digitized, and if yes under what name.

I too could not find Adonis.

The image is small scale so I don't know if this font has small serifs, like Copperplate, or is a plain sans.  
Assuming it's plain, there is a fairly close match in Silas Dilworth's design for Reservation Wide, a Type Trust Font:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typetrust/reservation-wide/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104061142/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typetrust/reservation-wide/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typetrust/reservation-wide/")  
The only letter that is significantly different from the image is capital G, which could easily be edited to replace the bar with a curve.  
Don

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104061142im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ReservationWideTypeTrust_6395.jpg)
